title: WTB or WTT:  EPDG, Tolstoi, Cycle, AB
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: WTB or WTT:  EPDG, Tolstoi, Cycle, AB
posts.post_content: I've bought a few graded (4 or better) types here in past few weeks, but still looking.  Also could trade.  For example, might trade PSA 3 Huggins (hand to mouth) or Jennings (one hand),  Brashear SGC 50, Ames PSA 4.5, maybe others.  Thanks.
